title: Update contact email to gocodezone@googlegroups.com

requirements.text: Update the contact email address displayed on the Contact page to gocodezone@googlegroups.com
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page displays gocodezone@googlegroups.com as the contact email
The email is displayed in the alternative contact methods section
The email address is clickable as a mailto link

constraints: Do not modify the backend Contact type or submission logic
Maintain the existing Contact page layout and design
nonGoals: Modifying the contact form submission functionality
